alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 3:36PM EDT until August 26 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Black River At Elyria affecting Lorain County. For the Black River...including Elyria...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River At Elyria. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Nickle Plate Diagonal Road inundated between Parsons and Whitehead Roads north of Carlisle Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EDT Friday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 PM EDT Friday was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 7.5 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 01/07/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 145 AM EDT.
